description: Emiya Noritaka is a magus. His research is on immortality through altering the flow of time in the body. His achievements caught the attention of the http://anidb.net/ch1951 [Mage`s Association], and they placed a Sealing Designation on him. He`s the father of http://anidb.net/ch44389 [Emiya Kiritsugu].
name: Emiya Noritaka
